meanings.definition: Of or relating to a spathal structure.
meanings.sent1: The spathal design of the building made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the spathal patterns of the leaves in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The spathal decorations at the party were so colorful and festive.
meanings.sent4: Her spathal creativity knew no bounds, always coming up with unique ideas.
meanings.sent5: The spathal architecture of the ancient temple was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Resembling a spathe in form or function.
meanings.sent1: The spathal flower petals were delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had a spathal body shape, blending perfectly with the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The spathal costume at the parade was a big hit with the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her spathal voice echoed through the hall, captivating everyone who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The spathal wings of the butterfly shimmered in the sunlight.
